notes.title: Sign up to Notes from Bloom
notes.description: The path to healing can be lonely and sometimes thorny. Our Notes from Bloom are twice-weekly reminders, encouragement, affirmations, and activities from our courses, sent directly to your phone to help you continue your healing journey.
notes.createAccountDescription: Sign up to Notes from Bloom and access our platform of resources.
notes.step1: We send messages to your WhatsApp number
notes.step2: Twice a week, every Wednesday and Sunday
notes.step3: We share affirmations, activities and reflections
notes.step4: Unsubscribe any time if you change your mind
notes.subscribeDescription: Subscribe to Notes from Bloom to start receiving whatsapp messages. Unsubscribe here anytime.
notes.unsubscribeDescription: Unsubscribe from Notes from Bloom to stop receiving whatsapp messages, or to update your number. Subscribe again anytime.
